fix.description: Fixed import dependency issue by removing database query dependency and accepting redis_client directly in constructor

changes.change: Changed constructor parameter from connection_query to redis_client

fix.description: Updated module registration to use configuration values instead of hardcoded values

changes.change: Used self._repository_config memory settings in repository creation
